pages.text: $(li)Stradpoles are tiny passive creatures that live in the lava of the Nether, but they can also live in water too.$(br)$(li)You can transport them using a Bucket.$(br)$(li)If you feed one with a Crimson Mosquito Larva, it will grow up into an adult Straddler.
When $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/straddler)Straddler$(/l) hits you with a throwedStradpole, you take 1.5 damage, and it disappears after a few seconds.
